name: cucumber-steps-parser
description: A parser to get the cucumber sentences from step definition files

scripts.test: rm -rf dist/features && tsc -p tsconfig-base.json && find src/features -type f | grep -i .feature$ | xargs -i cp {} dist/src/features && cucumber-js -- --require dist/src/features/**/*.feature

author: Carles Capellas <capellas.carles@gmail.com>
